name: INLExecutePlSql
description: Execute PL/SQL script in Git using sqlplus
author: INL

inputs.name: SQLRunType
inputs.label: Script type
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can run a SQL Script file, run an inline SQL Script or let TFS try to determine what files and what order to run a Git diff

inputs.name: UserName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the username that will be use to connect to the database.

inputs.name: UserPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the password for the user that will be use to connect to the database.

inputs.name: HostName
inputs.label: Host Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The host name of the server where the script should be run.

inputs.name: PortNumber
inputs.label: Port
inputs.helpMarkDown: The port number that will be used to connect to the database.

inputs.name: ServiceName
inputs.label: Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The sevice name of the database.

inputs.name: SQLScriptPath
inputs.label: Deployment SQL Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the deployment sql script file.

inputs.name: StartCommit
inputs.label: Start Commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The starting commit of the Git diff.

inputs.name: EndCommit
inputs.label: End Commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ending commit of the Git diff.

inputs.name: RepoLocation
inputs.label: Deployment SQL Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the repo to be diff'd and deployed.

inputs.name: SQLScript
inputs.label: PL SQL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The inline PL SQL Script that should be run on the target database.

inputs.name: SubstitutionCharacter
inputs.label: Substitution Character
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is defaulted to ` instead of & to allow the ampersand to be used in scripts.  To change back set it here or use SET DEFINE ON in your scripts.

inputs.name: Parameters
inputs.label: Substitution Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Click on the extension [...] button to add Substitution Variables.

inputs.name: FailOnSqlError
inputs.label: Fail On SQL Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck this if you do not want the task to fail on SQL Error.

inputs.name: DebugSQL
inputs.label: Debug
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this if you want the SQL Statements output to the log.

messages.SqlPlusError: Sqlplus encountered an error running the script
messages.NoInputContentError: No content specified for SQL Input
messages.InputTypeError: Input type is not allowed for automatic
